title: Basic Math
description: Practice basic operations like addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.

title: Science
description: Review about branch of science that deals with living organisms and their vital processes. Biology encompasses diverse fields, including botany, conservation, ecology, evolution, genetics, marine biology, medicine, microbiology, molecular biology, physiology, and zoology. Review about branch of science that deals with living organisms and their vital processes. Biology encompasses diverse fields, including botany, conservation, ecology, evolution, genetics, marine biology, medicine, microbiology, molecular biology, physiology, and zoology

questions.term: What is the powerhouse of the cell?

questions.definition: An organism whose cells contain a nucleus.

questions.term: What is the process of photosynthesis?
questions.definition: Conversion of light energy into chemical energy by plants.

title: Biology
description: Explore the study of living organisms and their processes.

questions.definition: The basic building blocks of life, responsible for all life processes.
The process that releases energy from food and produces carbon dioxide as a waste product.

questions.term: What are the taxonomic categories of living things from broadest to most specific?
questions.definition: Kingdom, Phylum, Class, Order, Family, Genus, Species.

questions.term: What is the hardest substance in the human body?

title: Geography
description: Test your knowledge about countries and their capitals.

questions.term: What is the capital of France?
What is the capital of Japan?
What ocean is on the west coast of the United States?
